verses.text: Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Bildad|strong="H1085"\w* the \w Shuhite|strong="H7747"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*,

How \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \add will it be ere\add* ye \w make|strong="H7760"\w* an \w end|strong="H7078"\w* of \w words|strong="H4405"\w*? \w mark|strong="H0995"\w*, and \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* we will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.
Wherefore are we \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* as \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \add and\add* reputed \w vile|strong="H2933"\w* in your \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*?

He \w teareth|strong="H2963"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* in his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*: shall the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* for thee? and shall the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* be \w removed|strong="H6275"\w* out of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*?\f + \fr 18.4 \ft himself: Heb. his soul\f*

Yea, the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be put \w out|strong="H1846"\w*, and the \w spark|strong="H7632"\w* of his \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shall not \w shine|strong="H5050"\w*.

The \w light|strong="H0216"\w* shall be \w dark|strong="H2821"\w* in his \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, and his \w candle|strong="H5216"\w* shall be put \w out|strong="H1846"\w* with him.\f + \fr 18.6 \ft candle: or, lamp\f*
The \w steps|strong="H6806"\w* of his \w strength|strong="H0202"\w* shall be \w straitened|strong="H3334"\w*, and his own \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* shall cast him \w down|strong="H7993"\w*.
For he is \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* into a \w net|strong="H7568"\w* by his own \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and he \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* upon a \w snare|strong="H7639"\w*.

The \w gin|strong="H6341"\w* shall \w take|strong="H0270"\w* \add him\add* by the \w heel|strong="H6119"\w*, \add and\add* the \w robber|strong="H6782"\w* shall \w prevail|strong="H2388"\w* against him.

The \w snare|strong="H2256"\w* \add is\add* \w laid|strong="H2934"\w* for him in the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and a \w trap|strong="H4434"\w* for him in the \w way|strong="H5410"\w*.\f + \fr 18.10 \ft laid: Heb. hidden\f*

\w Terrors|strong="H1091"\w* shall make him \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, and shall \w drive|strong="H6327"\w* him to his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 18.11 \ft drive: Heb. scatter\f*
His \w strength|strong="H0202"\w* shall be \w hungerbitten|strong="H7457"\w*, and \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w* \add shall be\add* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* at his \w side|strong="H6763"\w*.

It shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w strength|strong="H0905"\w* of his \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*: \add even\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* his \w strength|strong="H0905"\w*.\f + \fr 18.13 \ft strength: Heb. bars\f*

His \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* shall be rooted \w out|strong="H5423"\w* of his \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, and it shall \w bring|strong="H6805"\w* him to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w terrors|strong="H1091"\w*.

It shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in his \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, because \add it is\add* \w none|strong="H1097"\w* of his: \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w* shall be \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* upon his \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w*.
His \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* shall be dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w* beneath, and \w above|strong="H4605"\w* shall his \w branch|strong="H7105"\w* be cut \w off|strong="H5243"\w*.
His \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and he shall have no \w name|strong="H8034"\w* in the \w street|strong="H6440"\w*.

He shall be \w driven|strong="H1920"\w* from \w light|strong="H0216"\w* into \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and \w chased|strong="H5074"\w* out of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*.\f + \fr 18.18 \ft He…: Heb. They shall drive him\f*
He shall neither have \w son|strong="H5209"\w* nor \w nephew|strong="H5220"\w* among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, nor any \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w* in his \w dwellings|strong="H4033"\w*.

They that come \w after|strong="H0314"\w* \add him\add* shall be \w astonied|strong="H8074"\w* at his \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, as they that went \w before|strong="H6931"\w* were \w affrighted|strong="H0270"\w*.\f + \fr 18.20 \ft went…: or, lived with him\f*\f + \fr 18.20 \ft were…: Heb. laid hold on horror\f*

Surely such \add are\add* the \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H5767"\w*, and this \add is\add* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add of him that\add* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* not \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.
